nodes.text: Much like thousands of other space stations that were created or converted into battle stations during the Clone Wars, Juma 9 was built to serve the Galactic Republic as a base while the Grand Army of the Republic liberated nearby star systems, most notably Ryloth. The station was home to the cryptologist Aren Bron and the 212th Attack Battalion during the Battle of Ryloth and a short time afterwards, up until the Battle of Behpour. During their stay, the station was attacked by Separatist forces under the command of Kul Teska. After Plo Koon and Obi-Wan Kenobi went missing, Masters Kit Fisto and Mace Windu went in and found Private Switch. Ponds then later found Cody and three other troopers.
